I really fell in love with the game when I first started playing, even though I was very bad at it. I played all the time with my friends and we had fun but a couple of months ago the amount of cheaters seemed to increse by a ton and ever since playing the game doesn't give off the same vibe. I hop on to have some fun but leave depressed and sad because I only start to hate the community even though there are so many nice people. We only recognize the idiots and hackers and personally I do not know how to fix the problem but there has to be a solution because Valve can not just let go and leave us hanging like this.

In general a great game with even greater potential but the experience is being taken and worsened by hackers and toxic 10 year olds.
